name: Friday Night Funkin Vs. OKOKA
description:
Well, I created this game. What else can I say? And yes, if the game does not start, please drop it on the desktop and then it should work, I will try to fix this bug in the future. 

And about the mod, there are still 4 main songs, respectively 1 week and as many as 13 additional, (as of version 1.0.0), my plan is to make another week with 4 songs.

If you want to get maximum emotion, I suggest you play all the songs on hard, then you will feel the same pain as I did making this mod.

If you notice a bug or something like that, message me on VKontakte or Twitter, all my contact information is below, and don't forget to leave feedback so I can make the mod better.

VKontakte:@okokus
 Twitter:@okokus27
